content: Note that the length of a two-dimensional array is the number of one-dimensional arrays it contains. In the above example, weirdTwoDimArray.length is 3, whereas weirdTwoDimArray[2].length is 5.
stemmed: note length two-dimension array number one-dimension array contain . In exampl , weirdtwodimarray.length 3 , wherea weirdtwodimarray [ 2 ] .length 5 .
